dc_title_s: Niigata-ken shichōson jichi-kuiki shinkyū chōson zenzu Nagai Komazō.
dc_description_s: Mounted cover title. Lithograph. In Japanese. Oriented with north to the upper right. 4 sheets joined. Relief shown by hachures. Includes 1 inset, address chart (correspondence between old and new names) and legend. Shows distance of roads and sea routes. 1 map: 74 x 103 cm., folded in cover 20 x 14 cm.
